data.name: Pirates Outlaws
data.detailed_description:
Play cards, build your deck to get the best combos! In Pirates Outlaws pick a character with a pre-made deck. Explore and manage your expedition to get more gold and reputation. Manage your deck and ammo to defeat enemies strategy, in a turn per turn combat system.

The path to become a wealthy and respected Pirate will not be easy!

BATTLE: 50 outlaws and defeat 20 unique bosses in a turn per turn card combat system.

BUILD YOUR DECK: Play your cards and manage your Ammo for the best combo. Build a strategy around 6 playable characters with a pre-made deck and unique ability.

COLLECT CARDS AND RELICS: More than 250 Cards to collect and 80 Relics to discover from 3 varied chapters.

SAIL FROM ISLE TO ISLE: on a procedural generated map and choose your path among battles, events, market and tavern.

EXPLORE: 3 unique seas and chapters with their own difficulty and secret.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
